meanings.definition: The top stone of a structure or wall.
meanings.sent1: The builders carefully placed the capstones on the castle walls.
meanings.sent2: The ancient ruins still have their capstones intact.
meanings.sent3: The capstones on the wall seemed to be chatting with each other.
meanings.sent4: Her graduation was the capstone of her academic journey.
meanings.sent5: The capstones gleamed in the sunlight, marking the completion of the tower.

meanings.definition: A crowning achievement or final touch.
meanings.sent1: Winning the championship was the capstone of his sports career.
meanings.sent2: The successful product launch was the capstone of their hard work.
meanings.sent3: The capstones of the project were celebrated with a grand party.
meanings.sent4: Her award-winning novel was the capstone of her writing career.
meanings.sent5: The final presentation was the capstone that impressed the investors.
